short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Begin Your Browsing Journey With a Super Cool Meme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You Feel Sad? We Are Here For You.

Every time you open a new Tab, a super cool new MEME will show up, our extension grabs a random meme from Reddit with three different categories (memes, dankmemes, meirl).

our next update will make you able to choose your favorite meme category, stay lit ;)
